page.title: 09INDUSTRY IN NAILSWORTH
page.content: Industry in Nailsworth goes back to the last century. {Ruskin Mill }has a working water wheel and inside nowadays are craft exhibitions.Other mills in Nailsworth include {Longfords Mill}which produces tennis ball cloth.{Egypt Mill}has been grinding corn since the 15th century. Another factory,{Hilliers,}do bacon curing.It was founded by Isaac Hillier in 1819. One of the most important factories in Nailsworth is {McEvoys. They make valves and well head assemblies controlling the flow of oil and gas on rigs.They have been expanding over the years with the boom of the oil business.Along Horsley road there is the {Midland Fishery.}Here trout and other fresh water fish are held and later transported all over the country.
